price: So flee to Allah[16]. Indeed, I am a clear warner to you from Him.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: [16] From His punishment to His reward by shunning disbelief and sin and by obeying Him.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
